hexconjuring.page.conjuretoolspells.entr: I seem to have stumbled upon a way to $(o)manipulate matter$() using _media.
hexconjuring.page.conjuretoolspells.conj: Accepts a player entity and a $(l:casting/101)number/$, then conjures a pickaxe. $(br)The pickaxe's durability is determined by the value put in. Costs two tenths of an $(l:items/amethyst#dust)$(item)amethyst dust/$ per point of durability, plus an extra ten to summon it.

Accepts a player entity and a $(l:casting/101)number/$, then conjures an axe. $(br)The pickaxe's durability is determined by the value put in. Costs two tenths of an $(l:items/amethyst#dust)$(item)amethyst dust/$ per point of durability, plus an extra ten to summon it.
hexconjuring.page.dummy_actions.signum: Accepts a $(l:casting/101)number/$, returns -1 if it is negative, 0 if 0, 1 if positive.
